attributes.action: David Cameron must resign with the immediate affect.
attributes.additional_details:
Also britain dont need MPs and PM who cannot negotiate trade deals on behalf of UK with EU and rest of the world effectively and efficiently in case of BREXIT. We dont need incapable MPs who cannot make our own laws and can't perform what they promised for?
One side he has been using our money to benefits his own agendas and on the other hand he admits he profited from father's Panama offshore trust. 
Cameron must resign now and this will be the only way for citizens to have fair referendum.
attributes.background: David Cameron promised for fair referendum and now he has been deliberately trying to scare people and using UK Tax payers money to influence his in-campaign. He is intentionally misguiding citizens by scaring them regarding brexit and not telling the actual truths.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
